title: Documentation - Method: projects.getSupportedLanguages
abstract:
# Documentation - Method: projects.getSupportedLanguages
Returns a list of supported languages for translation.
#
content:
## HTTP request`GET https://{TRANSLATION_GDCH_ENDPOINT}/v3/{parent}/supportedLanguages`
### Path parameters| Parameters | Parameters.1                        |
|:-------------|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| parent  | string Required. Project to make a call. Must refer to a caller's project.Format: projects/{project-id}. |
### Query parameters| Parameters   | Parameters.1                                       |
|:--------------------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| displayLanguageCode | string Optional. The language to use to return localized, human-readable names of supported languages. If missing, then display names are not returned in a response. |
### Request bodyThe request body must be empty.
### Response bodyIf successful, the response body contains an instance of ` [SupportedLanguages](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/apis/vertex-ai/translation/rest/v3/SupportedLanguages) ` .
